author: cms-AlCaDB
body:
backport of #16671

# Summary of changes in Global Tags 
 
## Upgrade 
 
   * **PhaseI realistic scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v24](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v24) as [81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v23](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v23) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v24/81X_upgrade2017_realistic_v23): 
      * improved simulation geometry: fix all remaining overlaps in Pixel support structure, subtraction with Union solid replacement in ES support structure
 
   * **PhaseI design scenario** : [81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v8](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v8) as [81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v7](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/list/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v7) with the following [changes](https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v8/81X_upgrade2017_design_IdealBS_v7): 
      * improved simulation geometry: fix all remaining overlaps in Pixel support structure, subtraction with Union solid replacement in ES support structure

@ianna this addresses [this request](https://hypernews.cern.ch/HyperNews/CMS/get/calibrations/2752.html)
title: [81X] update phase-I Simulation geometry
